text.div:
Generated Narrative: ValueSet R5-v2-0179-for-R4

This value set expansion contains 4 concepts.

SystemVersionCodeDisplay
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-01792.1.0  ALAlways. All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-01792.1.0  ERError/Reject conditions only. Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-01792.1.0  NENever. No application-level response needed
http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/v2-01792.1.0  SUSuccess. Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message

name: R5V20179ForR4
title: Cross-version ValueSet R5.Hl7VSResponseLevel for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version ValueSet represents content from `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0179|2.0.0` for use in FHIR R4.
purpose:
This value set is part of the cross-version definitions generated to enable use of the
value set `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0179|2.0.0` as defined in FHIR R5
in FHIR R4.

The source value set is bound to the following FHIR R5 elements:
* 

The following concepts are not included in this cross-version definition because they have valid representations
* _no concepts_

Following are the generation technical comments:

FHIR ValueSet `http://terminology.hl7.org/ValueSet/v2-0179|2.0.0`, defined in FHIR R5 does not have any mapping to FHIR R4

concept.display: Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
Success.  Only MFA segments denoting success must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message

contains.display: Always.  All MFA segments (whether denoting errors or not) must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment message
Error/Reject conditions only.  Only MFA segments denoting errors must be returned via the application-level acknowledgment for this message
